message.content:
cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper proposes a new abstraction for points-to analysis in the presence of pointers, which is a common problem in programming languages and software engineering. The paper also discusses optimizations for improving the scalability of the analysis. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.PL (Programming Languages). The paper also touches on software engineering issues such as scalability and precision, which makes cs.SE (Software Engineering) a likely category as well. The paper also discusses data flow analysis and optimization techniques, which are relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper discusses the effectiveness of the proposed abstraction in the context of program analysis, which makes cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible category as well.
